title: Totes McGoats, the social media sensation
text: The City of Niagara Falls unveiled a new recycling mascot Wednesday in an effort to get more children involved in recycling, and when the city introduced Totes McGoats to the community, he instantly became a viral sensation, WGRZ-TV in Buffalo reports. â€œThe fact that a recycling mascot in Niagara Falls is making national news is [...] The post Totes McGoats, the social media sensation appeared first on Politics on the Hudson.
